alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 1:47PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Elko County through 230 PM PDT... At 147 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 31 miles northeast of Pequop Summit to near Montello to 18 miles northeast of Oasis. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montello. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
